001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.IPathFormatter;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAtomicValuedItem;
006import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
007import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagInstance;
008
009import java.net.URI;
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.Collections;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.stream.Stream;
014
015import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
019
020public interface IFlagNodeItem
021    extends IDefinitionNodeItem<IFlagDefinition, IFlagInstance>, IAtomicValuedItem {
022  @Override
023  default NodeItemType getNodeItemType() {
024    return NodeItemType.FLAG;
025  }
026
027  @Override
028  default IFlagNodeItem getNodeItem() {
029    return this;
030  }
031
032  @Override
033  IFlagDefinition getDefinition();
034
035  @Override
036  IFlagInstance getInstance();
037
038  @Override
039  @Nullable
040  default URI getBaseUri() {
041    INodeItem parent = getParentNodeItem();
042    return parent == null ? null : parent.getBaseUri();
043  }
044
045  /**
046   * FlagContainer do not have flag items. This call should return an empty
047   * collection.
048   */
049  @SuppressWarnings("null")
050  @Override
051  default Collection<? extends IFlagNodeItem> getFlags() {
052    // a flag does not have flags
053    return Collections.emptyList();
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * FlagContainer do not have flag items. This call should return {@code null}.
058   */
059  @Override
060  default IFlagNodeItem getFlagByName(@NonNull QName name) {
061    // a flag does not have flags
062    return null;
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * FlagContainer do not have flag items. This call should return an empty
067   * stream.
068   */
069  @SuppressWarnings("null")
070  @Override
071  default @NonNull Stream<? extends IFlagNodeItem> flags() {
072    // a flag does not have flags
073    return Stream.empty();
074  }
075
076  /**
077   * FlagContainer do not have model items. This call should return an empty
078   * collection.
079   */
080  @SuppressWarnings("null")
081  @Override
082  default @NonNull Collection<? extends List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> getModelItems() {
083    // a flag does not have model items
084    return Collections.emptyList();
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * FlagContainer do not have model items. This call should return an empty list.
089   */
090  @SuppressWarnings("null")
091  @Override
092  default List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> getModelItemsByName(QName name) {
093    // a flag does not have model items
094    return Collections.emptyList();
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * FlagContainer do not have model items. This call should return an empty
099   * stream.
100   */
101  @SuppressWarnings("null")
102  @NonNull
103  @Override
104  default Stream<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> modelItems() {
105    // a flag does not have model items
106    return Stream.empty();
107  }
108
109  @Override
110  default @NonNull String format(@NonNull IPathFormatter formatter) {
111    return formatter.formatFlag(this);
112  }
113
114  @Override
115  default <CONTEXT, RESULT> RESULT accept(@NonNull INodeItemVisitor<CONTEXT, RESULT> visitor, CONTEXT context) {
116    return visitor.visitFlag(this, context);
117  }
118}
